Name: Color Slayer
About the game: Push your reflexes and slash your way forward in this fast-paced, color-based arcade game. Move fast to avoid obstacles, and use your colored swords to cut down enemies. Act fast to build your combo, gain points, climb the leaderboards and unlock additional outfits.
